content: ***please note this pattern is available for free on my website or you may purchase the ad-free pattern here on ravelry *** **materials** less than 1 skein lion brand homespun yarn i used colorway painted desert 6mm/j hook tapestry needle scissors **gauge and sizing** it is hard to measure a gauge with this yarn so instead i am giving you a few key measurements so you know that you are on track band width 3 inches finished hat measures 10 inches tall 10 inches across the body and 9 inches across the band **abbreviations** i use us terminology chain s chain s single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch blo back loop only half_double_crochet half_double_crochet st s stitch es decrease single_crochet 2 together
